subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Yeah--it works.

Laura deserves a box Frank!!

Robin


  ----- Original Message ----- 
  Fro=
m: Laura Kimberley<mailto:gjk1rrfan@...> 
  To: EVP-ITC@yahoogro=
ups.com<mailto:EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com> 
  Sent: Saturday, February 02, 200=
8 7:55 PM
  Subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] Yeah--it works.



  Welcome back Frank,=


  I have a question for you. You have given boxes all men here in the gro=
up except one man has any woman been given the opportunity to have a box? I=
 have requested one for a  long time now and even offered to pay you.

  Bu=
t if you just send me the schematics I will build it, I am studying electro=
nics now and here in Mexico the random would be a good thing I believe. Bec=
ause even though  there's no English speaking stations near me all I get is=
 English J



  Laura



  From: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com [mailto:EVP-ITC@ya=
hoogroups.com] On Behalf Of Frank Sumption
  Sent: Saturday, February 02, 2=
008 9:17 PM
  To: evp-itc@yahoogroups.com
  Subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] Yeah--it=
 works.




   There is a lack of the background hiss, and white noise of t=
he random tuned systems.
   
   The sweep circuit is simple, and using pre-=
made tuners a real time saver, provided a source for the older tuners can b=
e found. I used to get them from junk yards, but the old radios are getting=
 harder to find. They have the advantage of all the RF components matching =
the chip.
   
   Frank-S




----------------------------------------------=
--------------------------------

  Shed those extra pounds with MSN and Th=
e Biggest Loser! Learn more.<http://biggestloser.msn.com/>
